algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.SavedConversionsAdapter
public class SavedConversionsAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter<ConversionQuery,algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.SavedConversionsAdapter.ViewHolder>
Adapter class to populate a RecyclerView with saved currency conversion queries.
